Restrictions on Third Party Use of Credit Cards and Checking Account Access: In order to preserve the independence of Nebula Independent Business Owners and to preserve the integrity of the Company's compensation plan, Nebula discourages any arrangement between the independent Independent Business Owners creating indebtedness between them, and Independent Business Owners are expressly prohibited from using a Independent Business Owner's credit card or permitting debits to a Independent Business Owner's checking account to enrol or sponsor other Independent Business Owners, or to make purchases from the Company on behalf of another Independent Business Owner. 
  7. Sales, Use and Value Added Taxes: In designing the Nebula opportunity, one of our guiding philosophies has been to free Independent Business Owners from as many administrative, operational, and logistical tasks as possible. Nevertheless, Independent Business Owners remain obligated to comply with all applicable laws and regulations for the jurisdictions in which the Independent Business Owners conduct business. Independent Business Owners should contact the Nebula Customer Service Department if they have any questions about Nebula's activities in this regard. 

 

31.  INACTIVITY AND CANCELLATION 

 

  1. Effect of Cancellation: So long as a Independent Business Owner remains active and complies with the terms of the Agreement and these Policies and Procedures, Nebula shall pay commissions to the Independent Business Owner in accordance with the Global Compensation Plan. A Independent Business Owner's bonuses and commissions constitute the entire consideration for the Independent Business Owner’s efforts in generating sales and all activities related to generating sales (including building a down line organization). Following a Independent Business Owner's cancellation for inactivity as described herein, or voluntary or involuntary cancellation of his or her Agreement, including for breach of the Agreement or violation of the Policies and Procedures (all of these methods are collectively referred to as being "cancelled" or a "cancellation"), the former Independent Business Owner shall have no right, title, claim or interest to the marketing organization in which he or she operated, to any past, present or future Nebula trade secrets or other proprietary information or intellectual property, or to any commission or bonus from the sales generated by the organization after the Independent Business Owner's cancellation. A Independent Business Owner whose Agreement is cancelled will lose all rights as a Independent Business Owner. This includes the right to sell Nebula . Products, and the right to receive future commissions, bonuses, or other income resulting from the sales and other activities of the Independent Business Owner's former down line sales organization.  To remove all doubt, in the event of cancellation, the Independent Business Owner agrees to waive all rights he or she may have, including but not limited to property rights, trade secret rights, intellectual property rights, or otherwise, to their former downline organization, marketing data, financial data, or contact information related to that downline organization, or to any bonuses, commissions, or other remuneration that might otherwise have arisen from the sales or other activities of that downline organization, had the Independent Business Owner not been cancelled. The former Independent Business Owner shall not hold himself or herself out as a Nebula Independent Business Owner. A cancelled Independent Business Owner shall receive commissions and bonuses only for the last full pay period he or she was active prior to cancellation (less any amounts withheld during an investigation preceding an involuntary cancellation). 
  2. Involuntary Cancellation: A Independent Business Owner's violation of any of the terms of the Agreement, including any amendments that may be made by Nebula in its sole discretion, may result in any of the sanctions listed in Section 29, including the involuntary cancellation of his or her Independent Business Owner Agreement. Cancellation shall be effective on the date on which written notice is mailed, return receipt requested, to the Independent Business Owner's last known address, or when the Independent Business Owner receives actual notice of cancellation, whichever occurs first. 
  3. In addition, Nebula may cancel a Independent Business Owner’s account if there are no product purchases for a period of twenty-four months. c. Voluntary Cancellation: A participant in this network marketing plan has a right to cancel at any time, regardless of reason. Cancellation is requested by satisfying the requirements of and executing a Independent Business Owner Cancellation Form and returning this form to Nebula by postal mail, scanned document through email, or FAX. Upon receipt of the Independent Business Owner Cancellation Form, Nebula will process the cancellation. 
  4. Non-renewal: A Independent Business Owner may also voluntarily cancel his or her Independent Business Owner Agreement by failing to make an order within one calendar year from the anniversary date of enrollment. 
  5. Inactive or Cancelled Independent Business Owners Re-Enrollment Policy: A Nebula Independent Business Owner who voluntarily terminate as a Independent Business Owner may re-enroll as a new Independent Business Owner twenty-four months following the date of termination. If any such Independent Business Owner re-enrolls with Nebula, the Independent Business Owner shall be enrolled as a new Independent Business Owner, but any downline that was formerly under the Independent Business Owner prior to termination shall not be affected by such re-enrollment. 

 

A Nebula Independent Business Owner who has been inactive for a period of twenty-four months may be cancelled at Nebula’s discretion. The Independent Business Owner's downline shall be unaffected by the change and shall not be moved with the Independent Business Owner. For purposes of this Policy an inactive Independent Business Owner shall be deemed to be any Independent Business Owner who has failed to make any purchase for twenty-four consecutive months. 

This Policy shall not apply to any Nebula Independent Business Owner whose Independent Business Owner Agreement was terminated by the company for cause. Any such Independent Business Owner must have approval from the Nebula Chief Executive Officer prior to being re-enrolled with the company. 


32.  RIGHT TO AMEND 


Nebula BusinessPlan: Nebula reserves the right to modify the Nebula Global Compensation Plan at any time and for any reason, including but not limited to bonuses, positions of leadership, percentages and incentives, etc.
